title: High sierra issues
body:
Hello,

Since I'm on High Sierra, i've got some mouse issues. When my mouse is near the bottom of the screen (to upgrade a spell for example), my mouse teleports at the top of the screen !

Has someone a solution for that ?

replies.body: This version is fairly new so we'll want to dig into this a bit more.  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you directly with this one.
